e="preserve">Anthony William Pidgley CBE (6 August 1947 – 26 June 2020) was an English businessman. He was the founder and chairman of Berkeley Group Holdings, one of the UK's largest housebuilding businesses. According to The "Sunday Times Rich List" in 2019, Pidgley was worth £335 million. He was born in Surrey, England.
Pidgley died on 26 June 2020, aged 72.
